benchmark_details.name: TQA-Bench: Evaluating LLMs for Multi-Table Question Answering
benchmark_details.overview: TQA-Bench is a new multi-table QA benchmark designed to evaluate the capabilities of LLMs in tackling complex QA tasks over relational data, incorporating diverse relational database instances and a flexible sampling mechanism to create tasks with varying multi-table context lengths.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate the capabilities of LLMs in processing complex, relational data across multiple tables.

data.source: Diverse relational database instances sourced from public datasets such as WorldBank, DataGov, and BIRD.
data.size: 400 database instances with a total of 56,000 question instances.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics calculated based on the performance of LLMs on question-answering tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Model performance will be interpreted based on accuracy metrics calculated across different question types.
methodology.validation: Comprehensive evaluation was conducted across 22 LLMs of different scales.
